mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.title, n.user_id, u.username, g.name AS genre_name, c.title as contest_name FROM novel_tb AS n LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON n.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN genre_tb AS g ON n.genre_id = g.id LEFT JOIN contest_novel_tb AS cn ON n.id = cn.novel_id LEFT JOIN contest_tb AS c ON cn.contest_id = c.id WHERE n.service_type_id = 3
